program: Master of Computer and Information Technology (MCIT)

sections.text: Penn Engineering’s MCIT provides a rigorous computer science master’s pathway for students without prior CS degrees, preparing them for software and data careers.

items: Foundations: programming languages, data structures/algorithms, systems, and mathematics for CS
Electives in databases, machine learning, networks, and software engineering
sections.text: Students build CS foundations and pursue advanced electives across core areas with options for project‑based learning.

items: Strong quantitative aptitude; prerequisites as advised
Completion of required core and elective credits
sections.text: Admission welcomes non‑CS backgrounds; graduation requires completing core and approved electives per program policy.
Graduates transition into software engineering, data science, product engineering, and related technical roles.
